DOWNTOWN 2 BD, ALL-INCLUSIVE, AVAILABLE FEB 15TH OR MARCH 1ST

14 Vine St. is located in a quiet neighborhood, just around the corner from downtown restaurants and shopping and only minutes from Queen’s campus and the hospitals. Walk Score®︎ 97 out of 100

This 1st floor apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light. 

The building has 16 units and a locked buzzer entry system. There’s a laundry room in the building that is free for all tenants. With an onsite building superintendent and local landlords, there’s always someone available to help when needed. 

Rent is $1925 and includes heat, hydro, water, Bell-Fibe wifi, and free use of laundry. 12 month lease - no short term leasing. Parking is available. 

Non-smoking building. No elevator.

As previous winners of the Queen’s Golden Key Award for Best Landlords, our goal is to provide premium customer service to our tenants.

DOWNTOWN 2 BD, ALL-INCLUSIVE, AVAILABLE FEB 15TH, MARCH 1ST or APRIL 1ST

14 Vine St. is located in a quiet neighborhood, just around the corner from downtown restaurants and shopping and only minutes from Queen’s campus and the hospitals. Walk Score®︎ 97 out of 100

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light. 

The building has 16 units and a locked buzzer entry system. There’s a laundry room in the building that is free for all tenants. With an onsite building superintendent and local landlords, there’s always someone available to help when needed. 

Rent is $1925 and includes heat, hydro, water, Bell-Fibe wifi, and free use of laundry. 12 month lease - no short term leasing. Parking is available. 

We have a couple of 2 bedroom units available at different dates, including May 1st.

Non-smoking building. No elevator.

UNITY POINT SUMMER SUBLET / LEASE TAKEOVER

- Bedrooms Available: 1 bed/1 bath available in a 2 bed/2 bath unit (**second bed/bath also available**) 
- Rent: $1405.00/month (includes utilities except hydro approx $20 per month)
- Bathrooms: 1 (Ensuite)
- Available: May 1, 2024 - August 31, 2024
- Internet Included: Yes
- Utilities Included: Yes (Except Hydro: Approximately $20/month)
- Furnished: YES! (Bed, desk, chair, living room couch, coffee table, dining room table and chair, a small dresser storage, and a side table) 
- Laundry On-Site: Yes (in unit!)

Looking to sublet 1 bed/1bath in a 2 bed/2 bath apartment unit at Unity Point from May 1, 2024, to August 30, 2024 - also option for lease takeover to go from September 2024 onwards until 2025. 

It’s a brand new, pet-friendly, and FULLY furnished apartment (finished May 2021) at a less than 10-minute walk from Queen’s main campus. The location is very convenient and safe (key-only access and security on site). It’s literally less than 10 minutes to get to stauffer library from here and super convenient close to downtown area!! 

The suite includes free high-speed internet, and an in-suite washer and dryer, dishwasher, A/C during summer and heating during winter (again at no extra cost).

There is also monthly housekeeping cleaning at no charge! 

The 11th floor of the building also has a gym, a lounge, a rooftop patio, study rooms, various study areas, and a yoga room open to all residents with equipment and mats.

There is visitor parking and underground garage parking with additional monthly fee. 

Please message me if you are interested or have any questions! See less

DOWNTOWN 2 BD, ALL-INCLUSIVE, AVAILABLE FEB 15TH, MARCH 1ST or APRIL 1ST

14 Vine St. is located in a quiet neighborhood, just around the corner from downtown restaurants and shopping and only minutes from Queen’s campus and the hospitals. Walk Score®︎ 97 out of 100

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light. 

The building has 16 units and a locked buzzer entry system. There’s a laundry room in the building that is free for all tenants. With an onsite building superintendent and local landlords, there’s always someone available to help when needed. 

Rent is $1925 and includes heat, hydro, water, Bell-Fibe wifi, and free use of laundry. 12 month lease - no short term leasing. Parking is available. 

We have a couple of 2 bedroom units available at different dates, including May 1st.

Non-smoking building. No elevator.

DOWNTOWN 2 BD, ALL-INCLUSIVE, AVAILABLE FEB 15TH, MARCH 1ST or APRIL 1ST

14 Vine St. is located in a quiet neighborhood, just around the corner from downtown restaurants and shopping and only minutes from Queen’s campus and the hospitals. Walk Score®︎ 97 out of 100

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light. 

The building has 16 units and a locked buzzer entry system. There’s a laundry room in the building that is free for all tenants. With an onsite building superintendent and local landlords, there’s always someone available to help when needed. 

Rent is $1925 and includes heat, hydro, water, Bell-Fibe wifi, and free use of laundry. 12 month lease - no short term leasing. Parking is available. 

We have a couple of 2 bedroom units available at different dates, including May 1st.

Non-smoking building. No elevator.

As previous winners of the Queen’s Golden Key Award for Best Landlords, our goal is to provide premium customer service to our tenants.

- When are you looking to move

DOWNTOWN 2 BD, ALL-INCLUSIVE, AVAILABLE FEB 15TH OR MARCH 1ST

14 Vine St. is located in a quiet neighborhood, just around the corner from downtown restaurants and shopping and only minutes from Queen’s campus and the hospitals. Walk Score®︎ 97 out of 100

This 1st floor apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light. 

The building has 16 units and a locked buzzer entry system. There’s a laundry room in the building that is free for all tenants. With an onsite building superintendent and local landlords, there’s always someone available to help when needed. 

Rent is $1925 and includes heat, hydro, water, Bell-Fibe wifi, and free use of laundry. 12 month lease - no short term leasing. Parking is available. 

Non-smoking building. No elevator.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a large open-concept living and dining area, and a separate newly renovated kitchen with tons of storage and a built-in over the stove microwave. No carpets - floors are wood laminate or tile. Windows are large, providing lots of natural light.
